name: Limo
description:
What is the game about? :

In the world of Limo, the "Slimes" have evolved. You must protect your kingdom through dangerous hords, expanding your territory and defenses.

The Slimes can attack you from anywhere, and the map is randomly generated. So, every game is different.

You have to build a sawmill to collect wood, houses to generate population, and wheat to feed your workers and soldiers. 

The resources will be collected at the end of each wave.

What does version 1.0 contain? :

- 5 type of enemies. (Common Warrior Slime, Archer Slime, Bomb Slime, Tank Slime, Rapid Slime).

- 1 One final boss.

- 3 Offensive Towers. (ArcherTower, FireTower, VoidTower).

- 2 Defensive Buildings. (Palisade, SpikeTrap).

- 3 Resources Buildings. (House, Sawmill, Wheat).

- Random generation of trees.

- Random spawn points for the slimes.

- No copyright music.

-50 waves. Boss in the last one.

- Time Controls. (Pause, Speedx1, Speedx2).

What is coming in the 2.0 version? :

- Save Feature

- Settings Options. (Resolution, Choose Difficulty, Etc).

- 1 more Offensive Tower. 

- 5 More enemies. (Mitosis Slime, Frozen Slime, Shield Slime, Gold Slime, BatSlime).

- If there are more enemies probably it would have more waves.

I have so much more features for this game, such as:

- Upgrades for Offensive Towers.

- Focus Selection for Offensive Towers.

- Upgrade enemies IA.

- More enemies,

- More Towers,

- More Bosses.

- More Defensive Buildings.

- Randomly generation of terrain. (the shape of the map).

- Minimap.

And that's all. I hope you like the game, and if you want to support the proyect i will give to you the final version of the game at the end of the develpment.
